XDD
{{champion:432}} Star Guardian Lulu is nice :))
I see comments for people wanting Sona, Taric, or Lulu, (oddly enough and possibly illegal), idk how old she is. But why don't I see one asking for Leona to be the escort? That's who I'd want...

League of creeps.  Escort is a perfectly normal word meaning to guide/protect, but people always look for the dirtier interpretations.

As for Lulu, according to lore she's a fully grown yordle with the mentality of a child (well, a mentally unhinged child) so I'm uncertain what the legality would be there in regards to sex.  For this skin in particular I know there is separate "skin lore" and I'm pretty sure she's supposed to be a young child, so no, not legal at all.

In the Runeterran timeline, Lulu is old as fuck, but that's because the Fae world moves fast as fuck in comparison. She's got a biological age that is very young, but as far as Runeterran time since DoB, she is very old.

It's actually an interesting ethical question.

We also don't know if Runeterra actually has 'age of consent' laws...

I mean, those are an extremely recent development(past ~100 years or so) in our world.

Back in the pre-industrial era, and even in early industrial, it was perfectly normal - especially in farm communities - for a girl to be married and have her first child by 14-15. Gotta get as many kids out to help work the farm as possible, so you gotta start early since lifespans weren't that long.
